AUTHOR: kagami#6142
NAME: GNU
DESCRIPTION:
An attempt to emulate some common GNU text utilities.
You can pipe, e.g. "[p]grep -i google http://news.google.com | wc"
You can redirect output to pastebin, e.g. "[p]cat @chat > chatlog"
A pastebin API key is required for pastebin redirect. Set it with "[p]pastebin [api_key]"
